name: FishGame
description:
You are a fish. Your small fishy bones are weak, and you are prone to being crushed by the pressure of the ocean if you swim too deep. Eat smaller fish to grow larger, and make your bones stronger so you can venture deeper. Don't get eaten by the larger fish.  Perhaps you can reach the ocean floor and claim the Fishy King's crown?

Move your fish with the mouse. Simple.
